actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to revise the warning statement required by that act to be placed on cigarette packages.

summary.text: Revises the warning statement required by the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to read as follows: "Warning: Cigarette Smoking Is Dangerous to Health and May Cause Death From Cancer, Coronary Heart Disease, Chronic Bronchitis, Pulmonary Emphysema, or Other Diseases."

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to revise the warning statement required by that act to be placed on cigarette packages.
